⥈⥈Supported Features⥈⥈
- Export the ticket count and Story Points by Status in current sprint
- Export the ticket count and Story Points by Status and Label in current sprint

⥈⥈Support Jira Platform⥈⥈
Jira Cloud - Yes
Jira Server - No

⥈⥈Important Note⥈⥈
This application does NOT belong or related to the official Jira application in any ways. It is an unofficial application that is developed and maintained independently.
